          <title>
            <string language="en">Change of glucose molecules into starch molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderung der Glukosemoleküle in 
Stärkemoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement des molécules de glucose dans des 
molécules d'amidon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança de moléculas do glucose em moléculas 
do starch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento delle molecole del glucosio nelle 
molecole dell'amido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή των μορίων γλυκόζης στα μόρια αμύλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio de las moléculas de la glucosa en las 
moléculas del almidón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how glucose molecules (left) are changed into starch molecules (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">glucose</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie die Glukosemoleküle 
(gelassen) in die Stärkemoleküle geändert werden (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment des molécules de 
glucose (laissées) sont changées en molécules d'amidon (droites).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como as moléculas do 
glucose (deixadas) são mudadas nas moléculas do starch (direitas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come le molecole del 
glucosio (lasciate) sono cambiate in molecole dell'amido (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς τα μόρια γλυκόζης 
(που αφήνονται) αλλάζουν στα μόρια αμύλου (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo las moléculas de la 
glucosa (dejadas) se cambian en las moléculas del almidón 
(derechas).</string>
          </description>
